title: Actor Helps Woman and Gets Hurt
summary: Peter Mullan is a Scottish actor and director. He saw a man named Dylan Bennet hurting a woman near a music venue in Glasgow. Peter tried to stop the man and protect the woman. He told the man that the police were coming, but the man headbutted Peter and hurt his head. Security guards helped hold the man down until the police arrived. Dylan Bennet went to court and said he was guilty. He was sent to jail for 18 months because he attacked both Peter and the woman. Peter was brave to help someone in trouble.
